whatIsService.title: What Is HIFU?
whatIsService.content:
HIFU, or High-Intensity Focused Ultrasound, is a revolutionary non-invasive anti-ageing treatment that uses ultrasound energy to stimulate collagen production in the deeper layers of the skin.

Unlike facials or creams that work only on the surface, HIFU penetrates below the skin to lift, tighten, and improve elasticity all without surgery, needles, or significant downtime.

It’s often called a “lunchtime facelift” because it delivers visible lifting and tightening with minimal discomfort and quick recovery. At The Skin Firm, we customise every HIFU session to target sagging, fine lines, double chin, or jawline definition, giving you a refreshed and youthful look.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose HIFU at The Skin Firm?
whyChooseUs.description:
As we age, collagen levels naturally decline, leading to sagging and wrinkles. If you’re not ready for surgery but want visible lifting and tightening, HIFU is an excellent choice.

At The Skin Firm, treatments are supervised by Skin Specialist Dr. Karishma Singh, ensuring safety, comfort, and natural-looking results. With medical-grade HIFU technology and personalised treatment mapping, we help you achieve firmer, more youthful skin without going under the knife.

faqs.title: FAQs on HIFU Treatment in Pune

questions.question: Is HIFU treatment painful?
questions.answer: Most patients feel only mild warmth or tingling. Numbing cream can be applied for extra comfort.

questions.question: How long does a HIFU session take?
questions.answer: Sessions usually last 45–90 minutes, depending on the area treated.

questions.question: When will I see results from HIFU?
questions.answer: Some tightening is immediate, but best results develop over 2–3 months as collagen regenerates.

questions.question: How long do HIFU results last?
questions.answer: Results typically last 12–18 months. Maintenance sessions help prolong the effect.

questions.question: Is HIFU safe for all skin types?
questions.answer: Yes, HIFU is safe and effective for all skin tones and types.

questions.question: Can HIFU replace a surgical facelift?
questions.answer: HIFU provides lifting and tightening but is best for mild to moderate laxity. It’s a non-surgical alternative, not a replacement for severe sagging.

questions.question: Is there any downtime after HIFU?
questions.answer: No major downtime you can return to work or daily life immediately.

questions.question: Can HIFU treat double chin?
questions.answer: Yes, HIFU effectively reduces fat under the chin while tightening skin for a more defined jawline.

questions.question: How many sessions of HIFU are needed?
questions.answer: Most patients need only one session, with annual maintenance as recommended.

questions.question: Can men get HIFU treatment?
questions.answer: Absolutely many men opt for HIFU for jawline contouring and anti-ageing.
